name: @nozzlegear/riddlevox
description: An email capture widget that can be loaded onto a Shopify store. Built as part of The Shopify Development Handbook learning course on building Shopify apps (https://nozzlegear.com/shopify-development-handbook)
author: Joshua Harms <joshua@nozzlegear.com>

scripts.build: npm run validate && esbuild src/index.ts --sourcemap --bundle  --format=esm --loader:.css=text --outdir=dist && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
